pull.title: tests: RPC bumpfee totalFee deprecation
pull.body:
This is a follow-up to PR #15996 which deprecates the `totalFee` argument in RPC bumpfee.

If that PR is merged, several of the wallet_bumpfee tests will need to be updated to not use `totalFee`.

But first, we need a test for the deprecation itself. The intent of this PR is to add that coverage.

events.message: Move IsDeprecatedRPCEnabled to rpc/util.* to put into libbitcoin_common
deprecate totalFee argument in bumpfee RPC call

committer Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1557735249 +0200

Add RPC bumpfee totalFee deprecation test

Next steps: remove `totalFee` from the wallet_bumpfee functional tests.

events.body: (The tidy up commits are very much optional).

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15996](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15996.html) (rpc: Deprecate totalfee argument in `bumpfee` by instagibbs)
* [#15911](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15911.html) (Use wallet RBF default for walletcreatefundedpsbt by Sjors)
* [#15888](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15888.html) (QA: Add wallet_implicitsegwit to test the ability to transform keys between address types by luke-jr)
* [#15427](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15427.html) (Add support for descriptors to utxoupdatepsbt by sipa)
* [#15341](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15341.html) (rpc: Support specifying change address in bumpfee by promag)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

ACK 96f3be13d96becbd9586c6a4476329964cf625fd
Ran functional tests locally and reviewed the code. No manual tests.

@fridokus Thanks for the review. Given that this PR builds on top of #15996, you might also be interested in testing and `ACK`ing there, especially since the commits from `15996` that are part of this PR are no longer up to date.
@jonatack - the commit that adds the test has been added to #15996. Are you happy to close this PR now? (you can either open a PR for the tidy-up commits or just drop them)
@jnewbery Sure. My intent was to update the tests to not use totalFee but can do it in a separate PR and not divert further review time.
